entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming north 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
